channel.title: Comments on: Day 13 – Turkey: The land of unfinished roads

item.title: By: Sheila, Dave & Pat
item.dc:creator: Sheila, Dave & Pat
item.description: Hi A&E. Really good to follow the progress, and read your blogs. Really pleased that you appear to be making good progress in spite of mechanical problems. Please let us know if we can be any more help (!?).
item.content:encoded: Hi A&E. Really good to follow the progress, and read your blogs. Really pleased that you appear to be making good progress in spite of mechanical problems. Please let us know if we can be any more help (!?).

item.title: By: steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description: Looks like you're all having a big Adventure with plenty of Endeavour!
item.content:encoded: Looks like you’re all having a big Adventure with plenty of Endeavour!

item.title: By: Silvia
item.dc:creator: Silvia
item.description: Keep the updates coming guys... we all love following your adventures... we usually check your site at least 2x /day to see the driving progress... the California fans...
item.content:encoded:
Keep the updates coming guys… we all love following your adventures… we usually check your site at least 2x /day to see the driving progress…
the California fans…
